Subject: NZXT Hardware Problem

I'm encountering a hardware issue with my NZXT Kraken Z63 You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.. The problem could be due to overheating My name is Omar Hassan.. I've already rebooted and updated the drivers, but the issue still occurs. I would greatly appreciate any support in resolving this.
